name: Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets
author: IT Path Solutions

sections.description:
Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets is a simple, easy and fully-customizable WordPress plugin used to add popup on fixed position like bottom left, bottom right, left side or right side , top left side & top right side with User friendly Settings.

Social Share:
Shortcode for social share [uspaw_social_share]

Features

  • You can display any content like contact form, feedback form, HTML or any text content etc
  • User can Change Title text, background color, border color, text color, also user can add icon image too
  • Responsive Sticky Popup & Display Any Location (left side ,right side , top left side, top-right side, bottom left side , bottom right side)

Support

Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets is developed and supported by IT Path Solutions. If you don’t find an answer of your Query/Doubt/Problem in FAQs or Support forum, feel free to get in touch with us. Click here

Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets needs your support WordPress thrives on community. And, you are a part of community. So, we kindly request you to support Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets. And, there are many ways to support, both technical and non-technical.

Different ways to support

  • Report Technical Issues: While developing Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets, we took utmost care to make sure that we commit bug-free plugin. However, if any issues has been slipped in and you found it, we encourage you to report it. If you are new to community, Click here to find out how to report an issue.

  • Report Documentation Glitches: Documentation is a crucial part of WordPress. So, we take it seriously. If you have noticed any glitches in documentation of Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets, we encourage you to report it. If you are new to community, Click here to find out how to report an issue.

  • Report Security Issues: If you have noticed any security glitches in Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets, we encourage you to report it from Click here

  • Provide Suggestions: If you have any suggestions for Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets, we would be grateful if you share it with us. Click here to submit a suggestion.

  • Help in Support forum: Being an active WordPress Community member, you can answer to others’ queries on Support forum. Please visit Support forum of Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets.

  • Submit Translations: Help localize, submit translations in your language for Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets on WP translate.

Don’t forget to checkout other plugins developed by IT Path Solutions WordPress Gems

Services And Support

We are committed to top-notch Community and Customer support because we know if you have problem with Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets, you need a solution as soon as possible.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ultimate-sticky-popup-and-widgets to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. You will find Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets in your WordPress admin screen.
sections.faq:
Can i use any shortcode in popup content ?

Yes, you can use any shortcode or any text content or HMTL or social links etc
